campaign.story:
中文   日本語   Español  Русский 
iLidar: LiDAR for Makers | Solid-State 3D Robotics Mapping
Robots aren’t the future. Robots are NOW and you can make them. Robot vacuums, companion robots & UAVs (unmanned aerial vehicles)/ autonomous drones have grown in popularity and will soon become an integral part of your life. Be a part of building the future by joining the Maker Community! 
For autonomous robots, a core technology is LiDAR (Light Detection and Ranging Sensor). Ever wonder how a robot can see? How does a robot vacuum avoid walls? How does a self-driving car sense traffic or pedestrians? The answer is LiDAR, a scanning technology that maps objects or space by illuminating the target with a pulsed laser light. 
iLidar is the first solid-state LiDAR sensor made for ALL MAKERS from beginner to robotics developers. Overcoming the limitations of traditional LiDAR, iLidar offers cutting-edge LiDAR performance at an unbeatable price, all in one compact sensor module.
As Seen On
Interesting Engineering | Geeky Gadgets | hackster | engineering.com | Connetcted Crib | Brainiacs from Mars | Robotis Gizmos | Trend Hunter | World IT Show | Maker Faire Seoul 2018
1D LiDAR 
Utilizing a point laser, 1D LiDAR sensors are only capable of measuring distance to one point. While cheap and compact, their use functionality is limited.
2D LiDAR
2D LiDAR allows for basic scanning of space. To scan in 2D, most LiDAR sensors require rotation to sense distance on a line across space. 
iLidar 
Utilizing line laser technology, iLidar is capable of 2D mapping without requiring rotation. To scan a space in true 3D, iLidar simply needs to scan on the vertical axis. 
In the video below, you can view iLidar’s performance. Through innovation in short-range LiDAR performance, iLidar provides unparalleled performance cost.
 For more detail information, please download iLidar datasheet.
 iLidar Configurator 
Don't bothered by initial sensor configuration work on your embedded platforms. Plug iLidar into your PC and configure it as you want. Configuration data can be saved into iLidar's non-volatile memory section, and will be loaded at each power-up afterward. Real-time data visualization is also possible with iLidar Configurator. See what iLidar sees.
Open Software Development Kit : C/C++  
Have complete access to iLidar’s open source SDK (software development kit). Plug & play by configuring iLidar with a variety of embedded micro controllers including Arduino, Raspberry Pi, or Jetson.
The Hybo team was formed as the robotics club at Pohang University of Science & Technology(POSTECH). As makers ourselves, one of the biggest frustrations was the inaccessibility of a quality, affordable LiDAR sensor. Finally, we decided why not make one ourselves?
iLidar was created for makers by makers. Affordable, versatile and compact, iLidar makes LiDAR technology accessible to everyone. We continue to be heavily involved in the maker community including participating in the Maker Fair and cannot wait to hear about how you integrate iLidar into your creations!
Why are we on Kickstarter?
All funds raised on Kickstarter will go towards: 
1. Mass production costs for iLidar
2. Development of SDK & iLidar Visualizer software
3. Maker tutorials on how to integrate into a variety of robotics projects
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
iLidar is a brand new technology set to make Lidar scanning technology to everyone. As makers ourselves, we wanted to create iLidar for Makers which is why we are offering iLidar at such a reasonable price. While every mass production process comes with unexpected hurdles, we feel confident that we can offer this powerful LiDAR technology at an incredible performance/cost ratio. Heavily involved in the maker community, we promise to honor the spirit of our community proud by being transparent and open about our process.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: iLidar Performance Test and Product Delivery Schedule
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,
It's Hybo. In today's update, we present the results of a performance evaluation we recently completed. And we are also finalizing arrangements with our shipping company regarding deliveries.

Performance Test Report

updates.update_userinfo: iLidar related materials download page and performance measurement environment install.
updates.update_content:
Hello, Backers.
Here is the latest update from Team Hybo.
First of all, apologies for the long time since the last update. Covid-19 and related issues have resulted in many delays. Despite this, there have been many recent developments to report.

Hello, backers, It's Hybo.
The evaluation of the beta versions of iLidar is ongoing, as we have previously updated.  
Feedback we received from several testers is being incorporating.
We are now entering the final production and delivery phase of the project.  An updated delivery schedule will be posted soon, but we will begin rolling out units over the next three or four months in several batches.

updates.update_userinfo: Our evaluation testing phase is ongoing.
updates.update_content:
Our evaluation testing phase is ongoing with the participation of several backers who volunteered to help. So far we have identified and are solving several issues such as:
Saving the current scene, basically a single frame or single-shot   capture. We put this into iViewer, and also made a simple stand-alone   C program to do this.
Implementing the external trigger function in the iLidar sensor
Although iLidar can provide data at frame rates up to 100 Hz or greater, some customers want to operate it at lower baud rates. We successfully implemented a test using an iLidar at 57400 baud talking to an Arduino Nano. While it can be implementable, There are some problem in such configuration as below:
- Low framerate in low baudrate: Current iLidar does not support scan/packet configuration and thus only a framerate of 1~2 frames per second is supported in such baudrate.
- Too big frame: For host systems with small memories(about a few kilobytes) such as  Arduino Nano, even only a single frame from iLidar may consumes too much fraction of memory, or even cannot be fit into memory.

updates.update_userinfo: Hybohat, a development tool for iLidar
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
As we updated on the previous update, we shipped evaluation version sample to recruited backers.
All recruited backers received iLidar evaluation sample successfully, and shared their first impression.

Hello supporters,
We hope everyone is staying safe from COVID-19. We continue working hard on iLidar development during these difficult times. COVID-19 has caused many inconveniences, such as supply chain interruptions and remote meetings, social distancing, etc., but we are solving the issues one by one. As announced in the last update, we have recruited several beta testers to evaluate sample units.

updates.update_userinfo: Development process + Shipping delays + Sample for evaluation
updates.update_content:
Hello backers!
There's been a lot of activity these days, despite the Coronavirus situation here in South Korea. Pohang and the nearby city of Daegu have had a large number of infected patients, and many organizations have closed or cut-back their operations. Our team has been working remotely the past 14 days, with occassional visits to the laboratory as needed.
The 30 additional prototypes mentioned last update were postponed due to a delivery delay on one key part. We took ths opportunity to roll in a few small PCB changes based on results from our calibration testing. Those 30 boards are being assembled now and we will begin testing them next week.
Our iViewer development continues along, and we've finally solved one last issue involving cross-platform serial communications. We've also prepared an API for our generic C-language interface library, and a small demo program using that API which logs sensor data to disk. The core portion of the iLidar sensor firmware is basically finished, and we are currently implementing the user configuration interface. Preparation of the users manual and other documentation is underway.
Calibration of the iLidar has always been a key issue and area of concern, and it continues to challenge us. The calibration lab is up and running, but the process has taken more time than expected to perfect and implement. We don't want to deliver units until we're confident they are properly calibrated, so we have decided to delay the main shipments of units until June 1st.

Welcome to the new decade!
Production continues along, since last report we have produced new design of circuit boards This resulted in a flurry of activity, updated firmware testing and refining our factory testing procedures.
iViewer development is going well. The merge mentioned last update is nearly finished, and here's a capture of one screen.

campaign.story:
Canvia offers lovers of art and design an authentic and harmonious viewing experience with an unprecedented level of freedom to change and explore. Controlled via an intuitive app, web account or voice-enabled devices such as Amazon Alexa, Canvia makes it easy to find art to suit changing tastes, keep you inspired and enliven your surroundings.
Why Did We Create Canvia?
Just as Spotify has revolutionized the accessibility, exploration and experience of recorded music, and services like Netflix have done the same for vast archives of film and TV, we want Canvia to revolutionize the accessibility and experience of art. 
In order to achieve this though, we realized it wasn't only a question of content - we also needed to create a device and platform that:    
looks and feels like authentic physical art (i.e. a painting or print), conserving realistic details such as color, texture and brushstrokes
augments the experience of art with key information and helpful guidance, avoiding any of the intimidating bars to entry of the art world, auctions and gallery system
and is connected, interactive, sharable as an experience and - most importantly - flexible for people's changing needs and spaces.
In this way, Canvia solves problems with the 'traditional' approach to sourcing and buying art:
How Does Canvia Work? 
PLAY

Canvia is driven by Palacio’s proprietary (patent-pending) ArtSense technology that simulates the behavior of a physical painting or high quality print on a digital screen, whatever the environment.
Built-in sensors read ambient visual conditions and this data is used to actively adapt the displayed image. The light-emitting screen therefore appears solely light-reflective, as with physical art, and ensures all images retain a realistic painting or print-like quality (conserving details like texture, color and individual brushstrokes) under any conditions.
ArtSense technology simulates the behavior of a physical painting or high quality print on a digital screen, conserving details such as texture, colors and even individual brushstrokes
ArtSense also enables art selections that better suit an environment and context. In this way, Canvia offers a more realistic and harmonious art viewing experience than any computer monitor or TV; so real, in fact, that it’s difficult to tell the difference between Canvia and physical art. 
Don’t Just Take Our Word For It…
PLAY

With Canvia, seeing is believing. If you want to check it out for yourself, request a timeslot for a live demo or video stream at outreach@palacio.life.  
You can also find out more on our website, Twitter and Instagram.
Stretch Goals
The Art Library
Canvia is linked to a huge online library that includes artworks from all genres, eras, cultures and media (including photography), offering choices to suit any mood, occasion, context and décor.
Need something relaxing for a late-night study session? You can schedule one of Monet's calming waterlily paintings. Friends over for the big game? Go for a George Bellows from one of our 'Sports' themed playlists. Throwing a house party? We've got an explosive Kandinsky or energetic Degas cabaret scene for that.  
We’ll be offering two subscription tiers for Canvia: a ‘free’ tier that currently has over 3,000 works (and is growing everyday), from Old Masters to Modern and Contemporary art, and a paid-for ‘premium’ tier of famous and upcoming current artists, illustrators and photographers.
All artwork is carefully curated and organized into themed playlists (for both vertical and horizontal orientations), or users can create their own. 
Our recommendation engine also helps you find works matching your décor and preferences, and all playlists can be scheduled for specific times of day.
Artist Engagement 
Canvia is about sharing great art. We’re building up a network of contributing partners - individual artists and photographers, galleries, museums and colleges - to ensure we offer the best art in the world. 
Since starting our outreach activities in March, we've partnered with over one hundred professional artists from across the globe and the list is growing every day. We recognize the great effort of creating art and so contributing artists will receive a share of our revenues.
If you're an artist and would like to apply to our library, please contact outreach@palacio.life.
Device Features & Specs
Users can schedule their own playlists and upload personal images via the app (iOS or Android), web account, USB or MicroSD. Information about an artwork and artist can be added as an overlay, and the entire artwork can be explored through zoom and repositioning functionality within the app.
Voice integration with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant will be supported, although may not be available with the first firmware/software launch.
All works submitted by artists will reside in a closed system, which includes Canvia's secure cloud library, device and app. This will ensure the digital reproductions of artists' work cannot be misappropriated.
Canvia’s innovative patent-pending design allows customers to select variable frame/mat board widths, wood type and color, offering even more options to match your décor and creative preferences.  
Black, cherry, wood and white frame colors will be available for launch; black as standard and the other colors for an additional cost of $25. In order to upgrade your pledges, please follow these instructions:
Note that the final mass-produced frame might have slightly different dimensions from the current pre-production prototypes due to manufacturing constraints. We will inform backers of any changes.
Hinges at the back allow you to pivot the device and access communication ports for USB and MicroSD uploads while Canvia is still mounted to the wall.
Canvia automatically detects the orientation and loads compatible playlists.
VESA mount compatibility affords greater mobility and control.
We also have a load of additional features that will be revealed in due course, all geared towards further enhancing the art experience - watch this space!
The Team  
The team at Palacio brings deep industry experience across connected devices, IOT, cloud technologies and video & image processing, as well as art curation, art direction, advertising and media production.  
This confluence of technology and creative thinking drives our innovation and reflects our ultimate goal with Canvia: to combine cutting-edge technical design with an artistic sensibility to create an entirely new way of enhancing and experiencing art in our living spaces.
Why we need your help
We’ve spent the last year and a half developing, user testing and improving Canvia. We come to Kickstarter with a near 100% pre-production prototype.

We're now looking for your help to revolutionize the art experience. We can't wait to bring Canvia into homes, offices, restaurants and other living spaces and open up art to the world. 

Specifically, our Kickstarter campaign will help to fund: 
Completing mold designs for the mat board and chassis 
Completing an initial mass production and manufacturing run of our first Canvia model
Regulatory (FCC and CE) certification
Packaging 
Feedback! Even if you don’t want to buy Canvia, we’d love to hear your thoughts on our product and approach. You can contact us via the Comments section on this page or outreach@palacio.life.  
Timelines
Canvia is designed and assembled in USA.
30-day money back guarantee
We also appreciate that most backers will not be able to experience Canvia first-hand before pledging. We’re confident that you’ll love our product but as a reward for your faith we’re offering a 30-day money back guarantee: if you don’t like Canvia, you can return our device for a full refund within 30 days of shipment.
Contact
We look forward to hearing your thoughts. You can get in touch via the Kickstarter community board or any of the following:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re working with leading global manufacturing partners with a proven track record in technology and devices. We’re also ensuring the device is assembled in America in order for us to maximize control over end-stage delivery.

However, as with any hardware project there are always risks and challenges associated with supply chain and manufacturing. Unexpected changes could arise that have an effect on our delivery schedule:

Wireless system testing with final industrial design 

Certification or regulatory testing 

Supply-chain and logistics delays

Component supply shortages: we’ve planned our approach so that we can use components from multiple, alternative suppliers wherever possible. 

We commit to keeping our backers informed in a timely manner throughout the entire process and do everything we can to deliver Canvia as described and on time.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Being lucky enough to have picture rails in the house, I intend to hang Canvia off the rail using either a single, or more likely 2 parallel, evenly spaced apart wires of the same length. The type of wire commonly used for this, which can of course also be coated with a thin transparent / clear isolation (normally just PVC), is perfectly capable of carrying a current and low voltage I would expect Canvia to be running on. In other words the same thin, silver coloured and IMO rather discreet tension wire (with or without clear coating), that I'll be using to physically hang the screen, can also be used to route power to it. Only need to split the DC power supplied by the included adapter in a hidden location, run the power down the tension wire and then join the two electrodes back together behind the screen, to whatever connector is required, hopefully a standard barrel connector. To work out the thinnest suitable gauge, what voltage and current or resulting power does Canvia require? I'm guess probably 12-19V and no more than 60W (hopefully less). Ideally the Canvia team could maybe look into providing this type of combined hanging and power supply solution as an optional add-on, which, again just IMO, would make a far more enticing stretch goal than the ones seen so far.

campaign.story:
Le Livre de la Jungle, by Lion : Secrets des meilleures startups pour employés déterminés 
Que l’on travaille dans un grand groupe ou une petite structure, les meilleures startups, puisqu’elles redéfinissent nos manières de travailler, sont une source d’inspiration quotidienne. Le Livre de la Jungle recueille les conseils, méthodes et astuces des fondateurs d’entreprises les plus inspirants et les rend accessibles à tous les employés qui veulent s’améliorer, s’émanciper et se rebeller.
Le Livre de la Jungle : le guide de survie des employés
Depuis 2 ans, Lion collecte les récits extraordinaires et passionnants des meilleurs fondateurs, employés, et investisseurs de l’écosystème startup français.
Le Livre de la Jungle fait la synthèse de tout ce savoir, et propose un contenu unique et destiné à tous les employés qui veulent faire partie de cette révolution numérique - en grand groupe comme en startup :
Les meilleurs conseils pour construire sa carrière sur le long-terme
L’état d’esprit à adopter pour être une force motrice au sein de son entreprise
Les astuces pour collaborer plus efficacement 
Les outils et savoir-faires utilisés au quotidien par les meilleures startups 
Des enseignements et exemples concrets sur le product management, les opérations, le design, le développement, le management et bien d’autres domaines 
Les anecdotes et histoires d’entrepreneurs, et les erreurs à ne pas reproduire
Pour ceux qui souhaitent rejoindre une startup, pour les curieux, pour ceux qui se posent des questions sur leur carrière, pour ceux déterminés à devenir acteurs du changement dans leur entreprise, pour ceux qui bougent, Le Livre de la Jungle propose l’alliage d’un contenu théorique, d’exemples pratiques et d’histoires inspirantes tirées des meilleures startups.
L’économie numérique est une jungle, pour survivre, suivez le guide ;)
“Ce guide m’a tout appris” - Bear Grylls
“Je le fais lire à tous mes employés” - Elon Musk
“Franchement, c’est bien écrit” - Rudyard Kipling
[Ah, oui, on a oublié de vous dire - leçon #1 : fake it til you make it]
Mais au fait, pourquoi s’inspirer des meilleures startups ?
Tout simplement parce que les entrepreneurs sont en première ligne de l’économie numérique. Ils construisent les entreprises qui changent les codes établis. Ce sont eux qui modifient les manières de travailler, qui introduisent de nouveaux outils et qui transforment radicalement la culture des entreprises. Ce sont eux qui imposent le rythme de la transition numérique et qui maîtrisent l’hypercroissance
Cela en fait les meilleurs profs pour transmettre les méthodes et l’état d’esprit nécessaires à la survie dans l’entreprise moderne et dans le chaos de la croissance. Tout le monde, quelle que soit sa trajectoire de carrière actuelle, à quelque chose à gagner à observer de plus près leurs techniques et leurs histoires.
 Lion, kézaco ?
Lion est l’école de la cuture startup pour tous les employés.
Les employés des grandes entreprises et des toutes jeunes ont un point commun : ils sont la pierre angulaire de leur organisation et permettent sa réussite économique. Ce sont eux qui sont au coeur du réacteur et qui exécutent et implémentent les stratégies au quotidien. Il est indispensable que ces employés acquièrent les meilleures méthodes pour réussir dans l’économie numérique.
Lion a pour mission d’émanciper les employés, de leur transmettre les bons outils, les bonnes pratiques, et le bon état d’esprit pour devenir des acteurs performants dans leurs entreprises.
Pour cela, nous sélectionnons chez Lion les meilleurs entrepreneurs pour venir transmettre leurs savoirs, leurs méthodes et parler de ce qu’ils vivent au quotidien, des expériences marquantes qu’ils ont vécu. Un apprentissage qui vient du terrain.
Le pragmatisme fait toute la différence. Nous poussons tous les élèves à se mettre en situation de faire et brisons les barrières mentales : des ateliers permettent d’alterner la théorie et la pratique et d’acquérir les bons réflexes pour réussir dans l’économie numérique.
Le numérique s’apprend, et Lion est là pour transmettre le savoir-être et le savoir-faire pour le maîtriser. C’est toute cette philosophie que nous avons mise dans Le Livre de la Jungle.
Pourquoi participer à ce Kickstarter ?
Parce qu'en plus d'être les premiers à mettre les mains sur le livre en Octobre 2018, vous bénéficiez d'un prix réduit par rapport au prix de vente final.
La rédaction du livre
Younes Rharbaoui, Head of Content de Lion, va rédiger le livre en s’appuyant sur les notes de synthèse collectées pendant 56 samedis - 8x7 ;) - des interventions des professeurs de Lion : entrepreneurs, employés de startups, investisseurs, freelancers triés sur le volet qui partagent leurs secrets.
L’ensemble de l’équipe de The Family, de Lion et des entrepreneurs de The Family corrigera le manuscrit et apportera des nuances, exemples et astuces supplémentaires.
Date de sortie prévue : Octobre 2018
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
“Aie confiance, crois en moi” 

Le plus gros risque, c’est qu’après ça, vous ne vouliez plus sortir de la jungle :)

Bon, et puisqu’il faut en mettre d’autres :

- Rédaction : le risque existe que la rédaction prenne plus de temps que prévu

- Style : le risque existe que la patte du lion soit trop lourde

- Contenu : le risque existe que certaines personnes ne soient pas d’accord

- Compréhension : le risque existe que les paraboles d’Oussama soient trop impénétrables pour le commun des mortels
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Bonjour à tous,
Enfin ! Après une attente qui nous a tous paru éternelle - le Livre de la Jungle sort ce mercredi 9 janvier en libraire. À l'heure où j'écris ces lignes, les exemplaires que vous avez pré-commandés sont en train d'être délicatement emballés et devraient être expédiés ce soir ou demain.
Attendez-vous donc à une livraison d'ici la fin de semaine ;) On a hâte que vous puissiez mettre vos griffes sur ce précieux sésame.

Hello hello,
Un petit rugissement pour briser le (trop long) silence sur cette campagne.
On revient avec plusieurs nouvelles, et notamment la date de parution.
Le livre sera disponible le 9 janvier 2019 en ligne et dans toutes les bonnes librairies. On s'arrange donc pour effectuer les livraisons aux environs de mi-janvier :)
En cadeau, pour patienter, voici la couverture du livre, réalisée par la géniale Camille Dubreuil

Hello cher lionceau, 
Tu nous a manqué ! En vrai de vrai :)
On a le plaisir de revenir avec plusieurs bonnes nouvelles : 
- Le livre est écrit : nous avons passé l'été loin des savanes pour livrer en 3 mois une compilation des meilleurs cours, outils, anecdotes et petits secrets qu'on a entendu à Lion. Mais au delà de ça, nous avons voulu écrire un livre qui soit une référence pour les employés de startups, et nous sommes très fiers du résultat. On a hâte que tu l'aies entre les pattes !

ROOOAR ! Le Lion rugit de plaisir pour les 940 intrépides et féroces contributeurs qui ont précommandé le Livre de la Jungle. 
Grâce à eux, la campagne Kickstarter a été un véritable succès. Nous leur adressons un immense merci pour leur généreuse participation !
Bientôt, Elon Musk va pouvoir le faire lire à tous ses employés et ça, c’est pas rien ;) Mais il va falloir rester patient… car même si tout ce soutien nous a remplis d’énergie, de joie et d’ivresse, la livraison est prévue pour le mois d’Octobre 2018 :)

Hello ! Où en sont les livraisons ? 28 Mars toujours rien reçu :(
Merci
Du coup, je vais me sacrifier et je le lirai dans 1 mois ...
C’est assez frustrant en effet.
Je suis d'accord c'est dommage ...
quand devons nous recevoir le livre ? Merci d'avance

campaign.story:
Key-Flex magnetic keychain
Most of us have a lot of keys on their key-rings.
There is a key for the apartment door, a key for the garage, one for the mailbox and perhaps some others (e.g. cellar compartment). And there can be a many more.
There is your car key, a key for the Motorcycle, another one to lock the  bike, maybe one for your boat, etc.
Now think of your daily life.
In most daily life situations we only need few of them.
But on the opposite, there is (almost) no reason to have them all with you.

So, why should you carry all of them around with you and risk to lose them all together in the blink of an eye?
With our patented Key-Flex magnetic keychain we offer an easy to use, sophisticated and very stylish way to organize your keys.

As a passionate motorcyclist you know the problem.
You put the ignition key in the lock and the other keys dangle in the curves from the left to the right and back again, possibly damaging the ignition lock mechanics and leaving ugly scratches on the paint of your bike.
But with Key-Flex you can easily separate the ignition key and put the  other keys into your pocket.
 Of course, you can also protect your car's ignition lock in the same way.
Imagine you are on your boat and enjoy a beautiful day on the sea.
But at the next moment your boat turns over and not only your boat disappears in the water. Also the keys for for your home, your car, etc  are gone in this moment. Too far fetched? But what, if your key-ring falls out of your hand at an unfavorable moment and disappears the water? 
keyflex

With our patented Key-Flex magnetic keychain we offer an easy to use, sophisticated and very stylish way to organize your keys.

Generally I like to give people leeway to fix a problem but this is really ridiculous!

campaign.story:
Introducing the Mu One - the world's thinnest international charger. Four times more powerful than its predecessor, it charges smartphones, tablets and now even latest Macbooks and notebooks.
Previous winner of the British Design of the Year Award, Red Dot Award and the Accessory of Mobile World Congress, the Mu One is the next chapter of the Mu story.
Introducing the Mu One
The Mu One is not just the thinnest international charger in the world but now also packs in an amazing 45W of power along with fast charge technology – that’s enough to charge the latest notebooks, tablets, smartphones and other mobile devices in super quick time.
Pocket sized and compact, the Mu One has a unique and patented fold-flat design with an interchangeable head system. This allows the Mu One to reduce its size to an amazing 14mm thin – that’s over 70% smaller than the 29W Type-C Apple Charger!
Mu One 45W charger vs Apple 29W charger
Have a USB Type-C, Lightning or Micro USB device?  When it comes to chargers, the Mu One is the only one you need.
Combining ultra slim design with cutting edge power technology, the Mu One boasts PD Technology for a fast adaptive charge and breakthrough GaN technology that creates an astonishing 94% power efficiency. This enables a huge amount of power to fit into the super small Mu One. 
The Mu One is truly a fusion of award winning design and cutting edge power technology.
For all your devices, wherever you are. 
Mu One: Under The Hood 
The Mu One has an amazing 45W of power with fast charge technology making it suitable for all smartphones, tablets and even the latest Macbooks and notebooks. This is all thanks to THREE remarkable pieces of technology under the hood…
PLAY

  Firstly, Gallium Nitride Technology (GaN). Enabling very high-power in a super small space, all with 94% power efficiency. This is the real genius of the Mu One being able to pack a punch. This latest technological break through in power, enables us to provide big power in our tiny Mu One.
Secondly, Power Delivery Technology (PD). Fast charge, adaptive charge, quick charge – it’s all about being able to change the voltage output of the charger to adjust to devices and create a quick charging experience. The Mu One comes with a PD controller onboard and will charge fast.
And then, an Auto-Detect Chip. Providing intelligent identification to iOS, Android and other devices to ensure that they charge at an optimum rate. The Mu One provides the perfect charge no matter which device, make or model is being used.
The Mu One - A fusion of award winning design and cutting edge power technology.
 
As you’d expect, the Mu One will be certified to the relevant global safety standards for chargers.
Mu One international charger: how it works
The Mu One comprises a patented fold-flat design with an interchangeable plug head system, enabling the product to be used in over 200 countries worldwide whilst remaining pocket sized and portable.
To use the Mu One, you will need two main parts:
1. The 45W power block with a reversible USB Type-C connector
2. One of the three interchangeable plug heads
Simply swap on the plug head for the country you are in or travelling to, select the correct cable for your device, and plug into the mains socket to charge your devices.
The Brit - pocket-sized and portable, this plug will reduce your overall UK plug size by over 70%. Say goodbye to bulky UK chargers! Suitable for use in the UK & Ireland, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia plus 50 more plug type G countries worldwide.
The European - portable, with a 90 degree rotation for bi-directional use, this plug head enables you to charge the products you love with a stylish twist. Suitable for use in the EU, Brazil, India, Indonesia, Russia plus over 100 more plug type C countries worldwide.
The American - pocket-sized with fold-away pins, the streamlined design plugs flat against the socket and is the perfect travel companion. Suitable for use in the US, Canada, China,Thailand, Japan plus 50 more plug type A countries worldwide.
Mu One with US plug head attached
Mu One: Compatible Devices 
The Mu One incorporates the latest breakthroughs in power technology. It features the new reversible USB Type-C connector that has been adopted by Apple, Samsung and most major makers of mobile devices, so you just need to use the appropriate cable for your device:
The Mu One is compatible with Micro USB, Lightning and USB Type-C charged devices.
For Micro USB products simply connect a USB Type-C to Micro USB cable.
This generally includes Android devices, games consoles and cameras.
For Lightning devices, connect a USB Type-C to Lightning cable.
This generally includes iOS devices i.e. iPhones and iPads.
And for USB Type-C devices, a C to C cable is what you need.
This generally includes the latest Android devices and the latest Apple Macbooks.
Please see the FAQ's for a more comprehensive list of the major compatible devices.
Need a cable? We've got you covered!
We've teamed up with the fine folk at Native Union to bring you a special deal on one of their best in class cables. 
Simply pick the 'Mu One + Cable' reward and in addition to your shiny new Mu One you will receive a certified USB Type-C to Type-C tangle free cable, complete with a leather belt strap for easy storage. This is a premium accessory - a great partner for the Mu One.
More info can be found here: NATIVE UNION WEBSITE
Rewards 
By backing us and picking a reward, not only will you be one of the coolest cats on the block by getting your hands on a Mu One first, but you will also get a huge discount to the expected RRP.
The Mu One will be produced in black with the following rewards:
Worldwide shipping:
• Mu One International Charger bundle in black
• Mu One International Charger bundle in black + Native Union Type-C belt cable in zebra
• Mu One International Charger twin pack (x2) in black
• Mu One International Charger office pack (x4) in black
• Mu One International Charger squad pack (x20) in black
Mu One: Development Timeline
Upon completion of the Kickstarter campaign, production orders will be placed and tooling will commence. Thereafter, production testing and external certification testing will be undertaken to ensure that the Mu One behaves exactly as we expect.
Then… (drum roll) it’s ‘show time’ as we start mass production of the shiny new Mu One and gear up for shipping towards the end of the summer.
Here's a first look at our initial prototyping of the Mu One in the meantime...
Our Story
A few years ago two Dudes wrestled with a sketch.
A sketch that was about to have life forced upon it.
It was the start of a heroic British start-up story. A story that was solving a long overlooked problem of the size of the humble UK plug.
Having been unchanged for over 50 years the UK plug was outdated and outsized in comparison to the mobile devices that it served. That changed as the sketch became the Mu and the UK plug size was solved forever.
The Mu won Design of the Year, Accessory of Mobile World Congress along with other associated high profile awards for its novel and simplistic form factor.
But in reality, the job was only half done.
Under the hood, the unseen secondary challenge of the Mu related to the power that it provides. In its first manifestation the ‘Mu Classic’, the Mu had an output power of 1Amp — just enough to charge a smartphone. Later, the ‘Mu Tablet’, ‘Mu Duo’ and ‘Mu International’ increased the power to 2.4Amp — now smartphone and tablet ready. But the enemy of increasing the power of the Mu had two faces: the size of the components on the electronics board inside the Mu that were generally linear to its output, and the heat that it produced. The Mu, being super small, had a very limited enclosure to fit power and to disperse and heat. The impact that the Mu could have over a full range of mobile devices was limited by its essence — size.
For the last two years, the small team behind the Mu have been working with the major global semi-conductor companies aligning their design to the ultimate pursuit of these goliath power providers — high power density (lots of output in a small space) and high efficiency (low heat loss).
And the results are in…
The Mu One hosts 45W output power, now enough to power the latest notebooks and Macbooks. It hosts Power Delivery Technology that creates a variable voltage for fast charging devices, and it has an auto detect chip on board that creates an optimum charge for iOS, Android and other makes of mobile devices. All of this inside the svelte 14mm profile of the Mu.
Being able to add over four times the power of its predecessor is a result of the birth of Gallium Nitride Technology (GaN) enabling a huge amount of power to be enclosed in a very small space — all whilst running at a market leading efficiency of over 90%.
Finally, the solution to create the ultimate Mu is available.
Technology has finally caught up with the Mu that those two Dudes always wanted to produce.
Two Dudes
   This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our small design team first successfully launched our UK version of the Mu in 2012.

Since then we've established fantastic manufacturing partnerships allowing us to design and build a Mu family.

This will be our third big product release since launching the original Mu USB charger in 2012, and this time around we have been working with a specialist technology partner to deliver an extraordinary small and powerful product. The Mu One combines their expertise, our design skills and the superb production capabilities of our manufacturing partners.

All of these are in place and prototypes have been made so we just need to lock down those prototypes, push into production, create some tooling and stir in a little magic. 

Saying that, we've done this before and we know that nothing is plain sailing but we've built in some contingency time into our production schedule to allow for the inevitable 'item' that we can't foresee at the moment. We're confident that the pursuit of creating magic will overcome that unknown 'item'. And we've been here long enough to know that we'll be handling both during and after this campaign.

Now, it's magic time!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Last Chance to Pre-order the Mu Two on Kickstarter
updates.update_content:
Hey Hey Hey,
Here’s to 2019 kicking off well for everyone!
It looks like you are all enjoying your new Mu One’s. Thank you for all of your feedback, it’s been fantastic!
We wanted to confirm that all of you should have received your shiny new Mu One’s by now. If for any reason you haven’t please send us a or email directly to Olivia at and we will look into it for you.

updates.update_userinfo: Next Generation: Mu Two | Available to Pre-Order Now
updates.update_content:
A quick recap on where we are…
Units for our Kickstarter US Backers are being packaged and shipped from our base in Cincinnati right now! Almost there - products will start to appear at your homes next week!
Meanwhile, some of you have asked when the Mu One will be released on general sale as you’d like some extra units. Well… we will be looking to have another production run with products available in the New Year. We’ll send out a note when this happens and will be looking to initially begin selling through our current sales channels.

updates.update_userinfo: Welcoming the Mu Book LIVE NOW on Kickstarter
updates.update_content:
Splendid news!
The US customs service enjoyed spending over a week keeping our units warm but they have finally decided to release the and they have now been delivered to our location in Cincinnati.
So… let the posting begin!

Hey Hey Hey…
Thank you for all the lovely comments from those of you that have received your Mu One Chargers. It’s great to hear that you like our work! 
Here’s a shipping update...
All those in Hong Kong, China, Taiwan, Malaysia, Japan, Korea, Singapore – your Mu One’s have been dispatched. Delivery time for Hong Kong is 2-3 business days, all others listed are 5-12 business days. Not long now, hold tight…

updates.update_userinfo: Here’s to 2019 kicking off well for everyone!
updates.update_content:
Hey Hey Hey, 
Product. Envelope. Stamp. Repeat.

Hi Guys!

Yesterday we started shipping our first batch of the Mu One to our backers from our studio here in Marlow, and it looks like some of you have started to receive them already!  
Splendid!

seriously? Please *do* read my comment fully before replying to it. I explicitly said that the laptop can be charged with other USB PD chargers, even adding a link to one that works. Yes, the laptop can also be charged with an old-style DC charger, but also via USB PD, as most modern laptops. And let me repeat: yes, I have tried it. Multiple times. It works with different charges and different Monitors that have USB-C inputs which also support charging. It does not work with the Mu One.

You've got it wrong. Devices (like phones etc) bear the full responsibility of controlling how they charge their batteries. A powersupply (which is what the Mu One is) is supposed to deliver the requested voltage, and that's all. How much current the device chooses to draw from the Mu One, is up to the device.
You need to buy the USB-C / Lightning adapter

campaign.story:
We deliver the ultimate guided nap training experience that can help reduce stress and boost your performance. Beautiful soundscapes designed to help you switch off and rest in style at home, work, school or when traveling.
This is the ultimate in relaxation.
         100% Black-out banishes visual distractions
Passive noise isolation to turn down the noise of life
360 comfort with grade 3 memory foam throughout
The first audio device you can comfortably lay on
Free nap training content - Breathonics 
        Science has proven that taking a correctly timed nap can change your life. Our ancestors were doing it. Some Europeans still do it.
It’s just somehow the rest of us have forgotten the benefits that napping can bring. In today's society napping is seen to equal laziness. Something that is reserved for quiet Sundays.
The opposite is true. Study after study has shown that taking a nap can help your body relax, build its natural coping mechanism to fight stress and boost your productivity.
We have spent years learning how to master naps because of the stressful lives we led. So let us help empower you to be the best you can be. 
PLAY

 Meet the Team 
     SWITCH OFF AND APOLOGISE TO NO ONE!
At Work
  The worlds most progressive companies understand the impact of corporate wellness. Nap rooms will become the norm. Get the edge at work and increase your output. 
When Meditating
  Wait until you experience the sound of monastery chants or the atmosphere of calming rain in Silentmode. This is a game-changing way to switch off your mind and meditate easily.
When Travelling
  You've just been upgraded! Take the pain out of traveling and block out those annoying disturbances. Rest efficiently and feel refreshed at your destination and ready to go!
    Nap Mask
We have spent years on this journey and 24 months specifically designing, building, testing and preparing the ultimate relaxation mask for launch. Shut down your visual senses with this high-quality audio device and master the power of napping. 
      Features 
  Ensuring that you block all visual distractions is vital to calming down the brain. The Silentmode napping mask is 100% blackout with sockets that allow your eyes the freedom to move ensuring REM sleep can occur.
  Our patent-pending design allows easy packing and transport as well as unrivaled comfort. Highest quality memory foams enable you can lay down comfortably in any position and maintain Silentmode.
  A combination of soft-goods integrated with high quality bespoke audio drivers. Get comfortable and switch off with Breathonics nap music or play your own sounds on Spotify or any other music app.
PLAY

Customised to Everyone
Our patent-pending design allows you to customise each speaker placement ensuring you receive the highest quality experience possible.
Super Sonic Sound
We have partnered with leading audio providers to deliver the best sound experience possible. We've built our custom tuned hardware to deliver immersive frequencies and our proprietary napping music Breathonics. 
    Manufacturing
MIA has brought 40 years of soft goods manufacturing to the project. Check out MIA Factory Director below discussing Silentmode.
PLAY

       PLAY

 RISE and Gary Vaynerchuck feedback 
PLAY

  The Nap Music
  Breathing correctly is the first step towards awesome naps. By clearing the mind and controlling one’s breath it is possible to master the thoughts that flow around your head and keep you up at night, but it takes practice. Once you are able to clear your mind, your body will follow suit and awesome naps will become easier to obtain. This is all part of managing your sleep logistics.
Breathonics - Music to Breathe.
Watch the video below to find out more.
PLAY

Practice clearing your mind and relaxing your body with beautiful immersive music experiences.
    PLAY

    PLAY

Naps can be used as a natural solution to stress and help you improve your productivity. If you are new to napping, we can help you practice and find your ideal napping routine.
       Circadian Rhythm
Your Circadian Rhythm is ruled by an internal clock encoded in your genes. It runs on a 24-hour, light-dark cycle in sync with the sun. When you are jetlagged this is when your Circadian Rhythm is out of sync with the sun in your location.
Napping can help you find balance when you don't get enough sleep. Even a 20-minute nap can help boost your energy and help you restore levels of tiredness.
Sleep Cycles
         Sleep Logistics  
Our job at Silentmode is to develop our Napinness algorithm in order to tell you when it's the best time for you to take the perfect nap. We do this using a combination of data points from sleeping hours, wake up times and desired outcomes.
  After a period of time, your data points will help the Silentmode Napinness Algorithm customise and output your perfect napping schedule ensuring you can be at your best.
One of our featured audio artists Tom Middleton (SONUX) - Bioharmonic Sleep and Relaxation Soundscape Designer / Sleep Science Psychoacoustic Researcher 
The Circadian Rhythm has an influence on the amount of REM sleep you will receive in your nap. You may have experienced a dream early in the morning rather than right after you fall asleep at night. This is the effect of the Circadian Rhythm that peaks around 9 in the morning.
By understanding both your rhythm and sleep patterns it's possible to customise your naps to extract beneficial physical outcomes.
      Famous Nappers 
There have been a great number of famous nappers over the years. They understood the power of napping and how it could give them the edge in life. It's something they wouldn't compromise on. Would you like to learn their secret?
  Why are we doing this?
Stress and sleep deprivation, the silent killer.
Life is no fun when you’re constantly bogged down with stress and anxiety. And here’s what makes it even worse: When your body doesn’t get the rest it needs, your stress and anxiety are not only compounded, but your body doesn’t have the mental strength to fight it off.
You can fight back!
No matter what’s causing your stress or anxiety, it can be improved with sleep. That’s a fact. Better sleep gives you more energy, helps you focus, resets your mind, and reinvigorates your body. All of these benefits are proven to decrease stress and improve your well being.
PLAY

We've been in your shoes and we are building the tools to help us all fight back. But we need your help!
Please help bring this project to the masses. We feel guilty for hogging all the best naps.
Pledges
    Stretch Goals...
  Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
   Timeline
 The finer points
We are currently shipping to
USA, Canada, European Union, United Kingdom, Australia, Philippines Singapore, Hong Kong, South Korea, Japan, Thailand, India, Switzerland.
Please note that you will be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region, which can range from 0% to 20% in EU countries.
Not shipping to your country?
Please email info@silentmode.com
Need help? We're here for you 
If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@silentmode.com 
THANK YOU NAPPERS! 
PLAY

#WORKHARDRESTSMART
Get Your Project Funded Today!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have been in development for the last 18 months and have been building the prototype so it's ready to manufacture. 

Risks come from factory closure but Silentmode partners have been operating successfully for the world's biggest companies for the last 20 years.

We are confident that we will meet or beat our projected delivery dates. Our backers will be in the loop as we communicate updates at every stage of the process.

You can also join our slack community to stay up to date.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hey everyone,
Please find below an update on progress for Silentmode.Thank you so much for all of the messages of support. A lot of people NEED this product and you are not going to be disappointed. We have a series of Athletes testing the product and the feedback is truly exciting.
We are on the home stretch. Thank you once again for all your support!

Hey everyone,
We hope you had a great winter break. We are busy working on the new and improved app, you can follow us on Instagram stories to see updates on that. We are still on track for an April delivery and all materials are now ordered. We are also about 30% through tooling. We will have some NEW Breathonics content coming very soon called 'Sacred Spaces' which is super exciting. You can also check a sneak peek of our new packaging designs below.

I switch speakers to see if that would solve the problem, but there was still no sound coming from the same speaker. Yay! Thank you! I can't wait! <3
@SilentMode - So sorry for posting misinformation! For me, the fact that it was wireless was crucial, so I don't think I ever noticed or cared if it had an aux port! I apologize.

@Edward - the sounds aren't IN the SilentMode. The SM is just an eye mask with speakers built in over the ears. A smart phone with bluetooth is still necessary to access the SilentMode app, which is where the sound programs are. Or you can play anything you want through the SM via bluetooth, but bluetooth is required no matter what.
Does the SM itself has update-able software, or is a given headset set for life with whatever it got at ship-day?
Jakob
Thanks! <3

@Silentmode Team - Awesome! Thank you for the response! One last question I have is when charging, does the orange LED turning off indicate it is done charging or is that a defect? I plug it in and it always lights up to show it is charging but it always turns off after a certain point, is that just indicating it is done charging? Thanks!
Maybe this can be addressed in future interactions ... it’s not a dealbreaker as it may be more about my own sensitivity ...
Thanks,
I’ve backed 75 projects on Kickstarter , most are failures . You guys did a phenomenal job , I love your product . I hope you’ll give the backers first dibs on future versions.

The same goes for the other aspects of the app. Are there longer time allotment options? Thank you!

campaign.story:
The world's first motion-activated night light now projects images directly into your toilet bowl! 
                               How it Sticks to the Toilet 
Projector illumiBowl sticks strongly to any toilet lid material using hi-strength PU Gel (Think of it like a sticky hand on steroids).
Removes Cleanly. Will not harm your toilet lid.
Will not fall
Reusable
Cleans easily with water.
How the Image Projection works
Light passes through the film & through the lens & the image is "thrown" into the toilet bowl where the white porcelain makes a perfect projection surface. 
EARLY PROTOTYPES & DEVELOPMENT
Many of our initial prototypes we had to 3d bring or build out by hand in order to find a structure capable of holding multiple images while still having a strong projection "throw" but not be to big to put on your toilet. 
Early Hand Built Prototype
. 
Early 3D Design Renders
 Developing the projector illumibowl has taken over two years of constant development. There were many hurdles and obstacles to over come such as how to miniaturize the technology into such a small product? How do we make it capable to projecting multiple images? How do we make it stick on a toilet seat and get the throw distance needed to project? With time and lots of experimenting and prototypes we were able to work through all of these problems and now we are pleased to announce that the projector illumibowl is finally here!:)
Projector IllumiBowl
Sticks to Any Toilet Lid Sets to 4 Different Images Motion-Activated Activates The Dark Why Use a Toilet Night Light?
NO MORE Blinding midnight lights! NO MORE Stumbling Around in the Dark! NO MORE Falling in the Toilet! NO MORE Aiming in the Dark & Making a Mess!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We learned an incredible amount after successfully fulfilling our first IllumiBowl Kickstarter two years ago and our second illumibowl Kickstarter last fall. There are many variables when dealing with overseas manufacturers that we have been able to learn. We have been able to stream-line production & cut down risk significantly over the last two years. We have confirmed samples of the new IllumiBowl and are confident in the abilities of our now tried and tested manufacturers. There can always be delays with factories & ports due to unforeseen storms, strikes & political variables but we have done everything to mitigate these risks and we are extremely confident in our ability to give all of our backers the best IllumiBowl experience ever.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone, 
I wanted to personally reach out and thank you. It has been amazing working with you to bring illumibowl to life these last few years. Last week illumibowl was officially acquired and is under new ownership. It has been a pleasure to be illumibowl's inventor and co-founder and it has been amazing working with you all. I'm excited to work with you Allin the future on new inventions to come!

updates.update_userinfo: Adhesive Issue discovered. Email us for help with anything
updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone, Glad to here you're receiving and loving your projector illumbowls. A few of you have reached out saying your project fell off. We discovered what is causing that. It appears some of your toilet lids have a very slight curve built in to them and the adhesive pad is not connecting with the full surface on those curved toilet lids. On some toilets pressing extra hard on the unit to make sure it gets full surface contact is solving that concern. 
On others where the curve is too big we have tested using thicker adhesive ads and that solves the problem. It sticks perfectly with a thicker adhesive pad we have tested. Anyone who has had a unit fall off please email us at contact@illumibowl.com and let us know and we will send you free replacements with the thicker adhesive pads once those arrive in the next month:)

Hey Everyone,
All of your projector illumibowl's will finish shipping out today! Hurray! All U.S. backers should be receiving them at your house by the end of this week amor sooner as the last shipments will be processed and sent out by the end of today! 
Note: we had a few dozen people who have not filled out the survey to give us their mailing address. We will be shooting you an email to collect that info so keep an eye out for that if you haven't filled out the survey yet.

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping survey! Sending out survey today.
updates.update_content:
Hey Everyone,
Your projector illumibowls will be ready to ship soon! I am going to send the survey to collect your address today so make sure to fill that out quick since shipping should begin within the week!
Regards,

updates.update_userinfo: Almost 3x our goal in less than a day!
updates.update_content:
Wow! You are all amazing! With your support we hit our goal in less than two hours! Now in just our first day we are almost sat 3X our goal! This is gonna be huge! Thanks for al loo your incredible support! We can't wait to shine a light in everyones toilet here soon!
Regards,
Matt Alexander & Team IllumiBowl

campaign.story:
Introducing BiTool 2.0 Lit - A Universal Multi-Tool, Even Better
In 2015, we introduced BiTool: Best Integrated Tool to ease your daily life. Here we back again with a more innovative design. Smart magnetic tool organizer with LED flashlight that transforms your life easier, faster, and more convenient.
Redefined EDC toolkit will be the perfect gear for you to go everywhere.Thus, the BiTool 2.0 Lit debuts.
                                              30 seconds of your time could make a big difference in growing the BiTool 2.0 Lit community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or co-worker who just needs it!
            The Worlds best DAILY MULTI-TOOL KIT: 6 features packed in 1 bar. BiTool 2.0 improves your DIY works, don't need to carry a messy toolbox. Moreover, Lit allows you to carry your keys and other gear even better.
 From today, No more awkward situations!
    The CYCOP BiTool 2.0 transcends in overcoming these frustrations and problems.
Think about getting rid of your messy workshop and taking the exact tool from a bunch of screwdrivers and wrenches inside of your toolbox. 
Think about saving from a costly price to hire a worker for home appliance repair. 
Think about during working at home. Wanting to tight & loose screws with ease. 
Getting tired of screws slipping away from your hands and scatter all over the room? Annoyed at stepping on these screws accidentally without noticing them and do want a safer working environment? 
Being fed up with bringing your heavy toolbox everywhere and want a compact tool that includes most tools you would use. 
Want to have a good helper while assembling your furniture and make sure all parts are well-fixed all the time? 
If you have always brought a mini tool while cycling, think about adjusting screw on your bike under a blazing sunshine and always need a lot of turns until every screw is tightened. 
 No more Big mess, Only BiTool.
Inventing a good gadget was our goal - How can we make BiTool better? Multi-tool, More compact in appearance, More function, Stronger magnet. Lighter, and the most important thing, ALL IN ONE.
   All In One, One For All  
Rapid, Smart, and Magnetic Mechanism 
Amazing Usability. Rigid Ratchet Driver 
Compact Flashlight Combines with Magnetic Base 
Easy to Carry with 10 Powerful Bits
A Simple and Fun Gadget 
What we tried is to make BiTool even better and solve all the issues that the original BiTool encountered.
The compact & magnetic design makes it smarter than rest of the tools in the world. BiTool 2.0 Lit can be attached to almost everything. From your keys, jacket, daily bag to any kinds of traveling stuff. It will be suitable for any indoor or outdoor activity.
Be Neat...Take out your tool bits in a second. All BiTool bits are with clear marking on side of the body to help you to choose easily and promptly.
It's easier to organize all the 10 bits with the silicon part with power magnet embedded. The magnet is able to help you to arrange all bits in order. Furthermore, this also allows you take each bit you want instantly.
Choose the specific bit immediately without messing up others!
BiTool 2.0 will feature in a mixture of magnetic function from the previous generation, 5 Bits Compact BiTool and 10 Bits Combo BiTool. There is more space for screws to be attached to the side and the bottom of BiTool 2.0, delivering better usability.
 No matter how many task to get fixed, you can enjoy the best operation even under the tough conditions.
Never be awkward again that the screws scatter on the ground accidentally, you can collect them up in a second. We designed two sides of the barrel with powerful neodymium magnets, so that everyone can use the tool in a delight mood.
Everyone should have experienced that when tightening a screw and the others slipped away from your hands. When you need to fasten over one screw, you can simply attach the others on BiTool’s body to prevent them from scattering on the ground.
Shake shake shake...shake your head! BiTool not only like a screwdriver but also a ratchet wrench.
For unlimited working angles, BiTool 2.0 keeps featuring the quick 180-degree rotatable ratchet head that could easily change the direction of operation, adapting to operate in any kind of working environment even inside of a space.
The rigid ratchet of BiTool 2.0 will not be broken even under the most vigorous conditions. This feature will make BiTool more flexible in usage to adapt to any kind of working environment. BiTool is created to help to operate in no dead ends.
With ratchet head, you can tighten and loose screws more easily than conventional screwdrivers.
BiTool 2.0 will be your top 1 fancy gadget.
BiTool 2.0 & Lit is not just functional, beautiful and compact, but also including many new designs. The new additional accessory - Lit, the most resistant EDC everyday carry LED flashlight.
An LED light is ideal for everyday use over a long period of time. Never worry about breaking the light, since no filament is used, or need to replace it since LEDs can last a lifetime. These batteries also last much longer with LED light, saving both your time and money over the long haul.
One of the main features we created, the "2-Level Press Switch." We tried to keep the least design without unnecessary exterior buttons to keep it slick. And with the concave button design, it won't ever turned on unintentionally.
Press to turn on the Dim Light, and press twice to turn it off
Pressing 2 seconds to turn on the Bright Light mode
2-level brightness ( Dim Light / Bright Light )
The uber-mini design makes it perfect to carry every day. Lit can be attached to the metal surface, providing you better usability in a darker place and suitable for any indoor or outdoor situation.
We believe that your everyday carry essentials are a reflection of you and your lifestyle.
The BiTool 2.0 Lit's versatile design makes them perfect for everyone to ease lock and unlock every equipment, carry it everyday lightly. With a minimalist, stylish design, you can put it in your pocket, bag, desk, or attach it to the door, metal lamp, etc. 
The various mixture of color options will greatly fit both men and women to carry it everyday, or just stand it on the desk to be a elegant decoration. Matching the various color of BiTool 2.0 Lit to create your personality.
 Carry it out with your keys. Fit your pocket perfectly.
  BiTool 2.0 Lit: An ultimate portable multi-tool bar. An unusually addictive, high-quality gadget plus fidget toy is designed to help you relax. Play BiTool 2.0 and Lit at work, in class, and at home in your style. Let's Show More Fun!
Spin - Like other fidget, just spinning.
Click - Enjoy the click sound and the repeated motion.
Move - Moving your second Lit like a magician.
Take a break to let us stress melt away and relax with BiTool 2.0 Lit. For everyone who likes to play some unique toys.
    Inthe 2nd generation of BiTool, we focus on one simple rule: adapting to anyone, any handwork, indoor/ outdoor need, adventure and daily use. We observe the indispensable needs and integrate technical features with a simple and functional design.
That's why BiTool 2.0 Lit is great for everyone.
 That's the reason why BiTool 2.0 Lit are great for everyone.
Skateboarders/ Bikers -  The BiTool 2.0's minimalist style allows people to go out light and fix their gear immediately. 
 Engineer/ Housekeeper - saving from a costly price to hire a worker for home appliance repair.
Everyone - With a minimalist, stylish design, the Lit can be carried in the pocket, bag, or with keys.
Outdoor People - Don't need to carry a heavy toolbox everywhere, just a compact tool that includes most of tools you would need.
 Night return - The Lit can be carried in pocket, bag, or with keys, to light up your place immediately.
     Our first design attracted lots of people join us, but we intend to make it better. That's why we came up with an even smarter design, adding a silicon holder with a magnet embedded for our tiny tool bits to increase more precision on positioning. We also added the delicate fine threading to ease latch and avoid unlatch unintentionally. 
And that didn't make us stop. We've kept going and design another special portable item, the beautiful LED flashlight to provide everyone better operation on a various universal operational situation.
This is our 2nd generation of BiTool - The BiTool 2.0 Lit.
Swap Colors. Mix and match BiTool 2.0 Lit to create your favorite color combo. You name it and we'll make it for you. 
Special Series - Meteor Black/Solar Red, Moon Sliver/Comet Blue
Simple. Shy Series - All Meteor Black, All Moon Sliver
Fashionable Series - Space Grey/Moon Sliver, Space Grey/Meteor Black
Colored Up. One BiTool 2.0 + one Lit or two Lits. We don't think you should own this awesome gadget alone; Invitie more friends and family to join you. The more of you joined,  the more color will be unlocked by hitting our following stretch goal.
    Ultra Compact - Overall dimensions are a compact 142 MM (5.59") in length, with a diameter of 10.5 MM (0.41") and weight of 131 Grams (4.62 oz). This makes the BiTool 2.0 Lit a perfect fit for every day carry.
BiTool 2.0
Weight: 107 Grams (3.77 oz)
Width: 21 MM (0.83") / Length: 108 MM (4.25")
Materials: S2 Steel, Premium Aerospace Grade Aluminum Alloy (T6061), Silicon, Neodymium Magnets
Type of bits: Phillips Screw Bits PH1, PH2 / Star Bits T25 / Hexagon Bits HEX2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6 / Slotted Bits SL5
Color Options (3) : Meteor Black, Moon Silver and Space Grey
Lit
Weight: 24 Grams (0.85 oz) 
Width: 24 MM (0.94") / Length: 34 MM (1.34")
Materials: Premium Aerospace Grade Aluminum Alloy (T6061), Neodymium Magnet 
Battery: LR41 Button Cell 
Operation: Push-to-on, 2-level brightness
Color Options (4) : Meteor Black, Moon Silver, Solar Red and Comet Blue
BiTool 2.0 Lit will be shipped worldwide. No matter where you from.
         Hello. Everyone. We will make sure everything goes according to the plan to meet the promised deadline. We work with experienced supply chain professionals to ensure high quality product in a timely manner. Any update and we will let you know.
     CYCOP is an urban lifestyle brand based out of San Jose, focusing on creating elegant city transportations, accessories & tools for urban dwellers. Our vision is to create the ultimate design, to inspire everybody by each moment and experience from our urban life, even travelling. We believe that great design will bring you a unique journey, no matter in urban life or country life, CYCOP collection will tell many unique stories for you.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If BiTool 2.0 & Lit is successfully funded, we will make sure everything goes according to the plan to meet the promised deadline. We have good and expert manufacturing, operations, and logistics set up and ready to go. The funding raised on Kickstarter will be used for the mass production and manufacturing of this new line of multi-tools and flashlights. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible to ahead of schedule to get the minimal, elegant, most functional and smart everyday carry in your hands!

Finally, we want to say a BIG thanks to each of you sincerely.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Flavour Bottle: A New Twist On An Everyday Necessity
PLAY

What is Flavour Bottle?
Flavour is the world's first scented and flavored water bottle that creates the sensation of drinking flavored water, without the added junk and preservatives. It makes drinking water a healthy addiction by making it taste closer to soda or juice. The scent and flavoring is safely added to the lid, which can be changed around. (Patent Pending) These flavoring oils have been approved for use both within the EU and by the FDA, are already used in existing beverages on the market, and can last anywhere from 6 to 12 months.
20 seconds of your time could make a positive difference for someone else. Hydration is important, but so many of us don't get enough of it. Click one of the buttons below and share with someone who could use Flavour Bottle today.
Flavour has all the flavors that you will love. 
Throughout 2016, we developed five flavors which include: strawberry, watermelon, orange, grape, and cola. 
These flavors can also be enjoyed with carbonated water, which creates the fizz that many sodas and flavored waters have. 
So How and Why Does it Work?
Although our taste buds discern a good amount of flavor in 5 sensations (sweet, bitter, salty, sour, and umami), most scientists agree smell accounts for up to 80% of the sensation of taste.
Through a patented process, we’ve managed to safely add food grade flavors to a silicone spout on the lids of the Flavour bottle. These are added during the manufacturing process, allowing the scent and flavor to last. 
Rather than diffusing quickly, we’ve used a process that gradually brings the flavor and scent to the top of the spout, allowing it to last much longer. Our scents have lasted up to 12 months, depending on the usage of the bottle. Once the scent and flavor is used up, an additional lid can be purchased to replace the old one, without having to replace the bottle. 
The process is completely safe and is similar to edible waxes being incorporated into paper coffee cups to keep them from leaking. The silicone we are using is the same silicone already used by several other large water bottle companies on the market. 
As you drink through the spout, you’re also breathing in scented “air” from the straw itself, allowing you to get the full sensation of flavor while drinking water. You're also getting a hint of flavor from the flavoring oils coming through to the surface of the silicone. Structurally, we added a cap so that the scent wouldn't diffuse too quickly. 
When you are congested, you lose a bit of the flavor experience.  Food just doesn’t taste as good when you can’t smell. That’s because a special channel connects the roof of the throat to the nose. When we eat and drink foods, odors make their way up through this channel to olfactory cells in the nose. It becomes blocked when we are sick or congested or even if we are consuming something while holding down our nose.
There has been a lot of work done in this field of science. Below are just a few of many resources on this topic.
https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2012/05/120530133708.htm
http://www.livescience.com/2737-surprising-impact-taste-smell.html
https://www.scientificamerican.com/article/bring-science-home-jelly-bean-taste-smell/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VuR6QuWrHrc&t=101s
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EJud8MKrvBE
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0HxAB54wlig
It Really Works!
When we initially begun working on the Flavour Bottle, we had been through many different experiments to really get this concept to work as well as it is claimed by science.

We spent over three years of research and development to get to a prototype we felt worked for everyone, not just those who have stronger senses of smell. 
Our very first prototype was a scented cap on top of a bottle. One of the first things we realized was that we don’t consciously smell through our nose while eating or drinking. Most of the scent of our food is actually being breathed in through the back of our mouth. We also experimented with creating a scented plastic ring from plastic casting resin to put on top of a bottle.
Our initial prototypes
So our first prototypes did not work nearly as well as we expected them to. They worked similarly to the way a cup would work with a rim to drink from. Although it made the experience of drinking water more pleasant, it did not really add any taste to the water we drank. We had also molded this initial cap out of plastic and fruit flavors, and the scent did not last very long.
We began to think, what if we created some sort of drinking spout that was flavored. Its proximity to the mouth while water is being drank would work much better.

And Eureka! That is how the Flavour Bottle was born. Inspired by scented silicone bands as well as erasers with scents that have lasted a very long time, we decided to create a food grade silicone spout.
Our first prototypes were a few food grade silicone straws that had watermelon scents infused into them. We wanted to test these straws out to make sure they conveyed what we felt they would. The positive reinforcement kept us going to develop the bottle fully. 
We poured water in glasses and invited random students to try it out at the University of Texas at Austin. Check out the results below.
PLAY


Through a proprietary process, we’ve managed to add the natural flavors that beverage companies use in their drinks and safely insert them into our silicone spout. We are working with a manufacturer that sources food grade flavors that have been approved by both the FDA and the EU. 
The silicone took in the scent much better than plastic, allowing it to last a lot longer and diffuse a lot slower. Silicone has a characteristic that allows the scent to release when it is rubbed or touched, as opposed to plastic, which diffuses into the air. It is for this reason that the scent within the silicone lasts a lot longer than in plastic. 
Specifications
Who is it for?
Our goal is to make drinking water a healthy addiction just like drinking soda. Water is the healthiest drink at the end of the day, as it does not contain any extra sugars or other harmful ingredients. Many of us do not get enough of it because we gravitate towards unhealthy sodas. We vastly underestimate how much water we really need.  And for those of us who unfortunately suffer from diabetes, these sodas and juices aren’t even an option, so it makes it more difficult to enjoy water with actual flavors and tastes added to it.
But What About Flavored Waters and Fruit Infusers?
We did a test and looked into the ingredients of several different flavored waters. Most of these ingredients as you can see are preservatives and other questionable ingredients such as aspartame. Plus, they get expensive over time.       
Fruit infusers are awesome, but we don’t always have the time to cut up fruit to add it in to water, plus fruit goes bad quickly and can get expensive. Water is the healthiest drink on the market, without any sugar or added calories, and often times that’s exactly what we need.
We’ve also included a cola version and will continue to create more flavors inspired by soda, which cannot be mimicked by infusers.
Adding carbonated water increases the sensation of cola in the cola flavor.
Rewards
We want to wholeheartedly thank you for believing in our vision. You can see our rewards below:     
We have worked hard to subsidize our shipping prices while still ensuring a quick delivery after prooduction. We are working with global fulfillment centers to reduce the amount of time shipment would take as well as the cost, which is difficult to reduce typically for international shipping. We are also using a special high barrier pouch to protect the scent on the bottle, which adds a little bit to the cost of shipping. 
About Us
  Where are you in the process?
We have spent a long time perfecting our bottle, making sure it works as fantastically as it claims. We are working with a experienced material manufacturer to source food grade silicone as well as flavors from the world's largest flavoring oil company. These are flavors that have been approved for use both by the FDA and within the EU. 
What will the funds be used for?
Bringing a brand new product to market has its costs. We have a few working prototypes, but the silicone spouts we are working with have very high MOQs, so we need to raise the funds in order to be able to get a Flavour Bottle into the hands of everyone. This is because the process of using food grade flavors with silicone is a very specialized one and requires a very pristine environment, all of which lead to a high initial startup cost. 
What's Next?
We are super excited to be able to bring this product to market. The applications are endless, and we truly believe there are many additional modifications we can make over time, by adding more flavors or even adding a filter within the bottle. Below you can see our timeline and where you all have joined in in our journey. We are extremely excited to get this product in your hands, and we won't rest until we do.
Help Out by Sharing Flavour Bottle with all your Dehydrated friends. 
If you like what you’re seeing, you’re awesome! Don’t be shy about sharing it with your equally great friends. It’s so easy. Just hit one of the share buttons.
The more people know about the Flavour bottle, the more we can decrease this addiction to sugary drinks that’s plaguing our world today. With more input, we can add many additional features that can make drinking water even more addictive.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
All members of our team have backed Kickstarters that have had their delays and setbacks. No one wants to see a great idea executed poorly. An idea is worthless if it's never brought to fruition. We have spent a lot of time finding the perfect manufacturer for our water bottle, both the silicone part and the main body. Here's what we are doing to minimize any risk to you:

Manufacturing: Our most important part of this project is getting the silicone spout manufactured correctly. This means that the scent must be fully incorporated during the manufacturing phase. To really enhance the longevity of the silicone, we've worked with experts in the field of scent encapsulation, who have spent almost a decade developing this technology.

Product Adjustments: We want to deliver the best Flavour bottle to you, our backers who have put faith in us. That is why we encourage discussion throughout our process with our backers. If there is something we can do to improve the end product, we will consult with our manufacturers but also consult directly with our backers. Any modifications made will always be conveyed directly, and we promise to be honest and upfront.

Fulfillment: We've seen Kickstarter campaigns where a manufacturer did not deliver as promised or had issues with production machinery, which trickled down into the entire campaign. For production of the bottle itself, we have two back-up manufacturers that can handle the situation if something goes awry with our main manufacturer. In the event that we foresee any delays, we promise to be completely transparent with our backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
